archimate:BusinessRole.name: Data Integration Specialist
archimate:BusinessRole.documentation: Data Integration Specialist: A software designer or developer responsible for implementing systems to integrate (replicate, extract, transform, load) data assets in batch or near-real-time.

properties.value: Data Integration Specialist: A software designer or developer responsible for implementing systems to integrate (replicate, extract, transform, load) data assets in batch or near-real-time.
